Blog.post: Why don't you go away It's not like I want you back anyway I'm stuck here and you don't care Please just go away Every time I see you there It feels so sad My heart hurts so bad More and more each day Do you feel the same way Every single day It doesn't matter anyway I shouldn't even care Nothing more to say You've picked your way And I'm not in there Nothing more to say I'm stuck in the pain And You ain't there

I've found a way So I don't have to pray If I ever see you again I've found a way So I don't think of you everyday Day by day You feel so far away Even you're only one inch away The way how you act What you expect me to say I can only tell you that You're not the only one to fake It's not supposed to hurt this way If you ever understand Walking away is not the only way It's not supposed to feel this way Why don't you understand I don't give a shit

Let's talk this over It's not like we were dead Was it something I did? Was it something you said? Don't leave me hanging In a city so dead Held up so high On such a breakable thread You were all the things I thought I knew And I thought we could be You were everything, everthing that I wanted We were ment to be, supposed to be But we lost it All of our memories so close to me Just fade away All this time you were pretending So much for my happy ending So much for my happy ending You've got your dumb friends I know what they say They tell you I'm difficult But so are they Do they ever know you? All the things you hide from me All the shit that you do It's nice to know that you were there Thanks for acting like you care And making me feel like I was the only one It's nice to know we had it all Thanks for watching as I fall And letting me know we were done So much for my happy ending So much for my happy ending

ç¾å¨æ¯ 17 : 24â¦ æ»¿è ¦å­æ³çæ²æå¥ç åªæ å°åºä»éº¼æåå¯ä»¥ä¸ç­ ä»éº¼æåå¯ä»¥è«é¢éäºè©²æ­»çç¬¨èä¹ ä¸é»é» é±æ«æ°¸é é½ä¸å¤ æä¼æ¯åæ°£ æ¯åææä¸çæ©æ¨ é¬§éé¿èµ·çç¬é ç¸½æä¸åå¿µé ­éé *åæ¥å å¹²* ä»å¤©è«åç®äº Iâm so tired of dealing with those so-called âmanagersâ every day. Sometimes I really wonder if theyâre all idiots outside of work â¦ For example, How could you possibly break a urlLink flash urlLink card on the first day you got it?! I mean break it into half??!! ....................................... After buying you a mobile hard drive, kept calling and asking : Ohâ¦ is it ok for me to save my files to the hard drive?! Iâm so worried if my files will disappearâ¦ w t f !!! Or ... Telling me at 15:30pm TODAY that you need a urlLink ticket to urlLink China leaving TOMORROW MORNING?! There's no such a thing as *E-ticket* in urlLink China ...They dont use E-ticket!!! How the hell can I possibly get you urlLink ticket before your *departure* ?!!! Since the urlLink travel agency closes at 18:00pm and it's all the way in Taipei!! By the way... I'm supposed to get done work at 17:30
